body.p: Jno. T. Barber states that he lives about 3 miles from Margolyes Tavern. that I have been there several times and never saw any thing on the rowdy order. I was there when Margolyes was raising a stable and was there after it was raised I never heard of any dissatisfaction by any body against Margolyes as a tavern keeper
Given under my hand this 21st Nov 1861
Sworn to before me this 201st November 1861
Edward Pate J. P. B. C.
